nodes.text: Neska was a city on the planet Haurgab.

Founded on the planet Haurgab, the city of Neska was thriving during the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. When the Grand Army of the Republic arrived on the planet during the height of the war, the Republic troops were given permission to establish a small operations base near the city limits; the base would support the main planetary defense force stationed at Hadde Base.
